condition.description:
Sleep apnea is a common disorder that causes your breathing to stop or get very shallow. Breathing pauses can last from a few seconds to minutes. They may occur 30 times or more an hour.

The most common type is obstructive sleep apnea. It causes your airway to collapse or become blocked during sleep. Normal breathing starts again with a snort or choking sound. People with sleep apnea often snore loudly. However, not everyone who snores has sleep apnea.

You are more at risk for sleep apnea if you are overweight, male, or have a family history or small airways. Children with enlarged tonsils may also get it.

Doctors diagnose sleep apnea based on medical and family histories, a physical exam, and sleep study results.

When your sleep is interrupted throughout the night, you can be drowsy during the day. People with sleep apnea are at higher risk for car crashes, work-related accidents, and other medical problems. If you have it, it is important to get treatment. Lifestyle changes, mouthpieces, surgery, and breathing devices can treat sleep apnea in many people.

NIH: National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute
condition.name: Sleep apnea
symptoms: Breathing that stops or gets very shallow while sleeping

carousel_items: If using for shift work sleep disorder (SWSD), take Nuvigil about an hour before the start of your shift.
Taking caffeine with Nuvigil can make you feel nervous, shaky, and will raise your heartbeat.
If you've been taking Nuvigil for a while and decide to stop it, you'll experience withdrawal symptoms if you stop it too fast.
Tell your doctor right away if you break out in a rash.
Don't drink alcohol with Nuvigil.

basics.benefits_moa: Nuvigil is a stimulant that helps you feel awake by affecting neurotransmitters in the brain.
basics.bottom_line: Nuvigil is effective in improving alertness, but it can interact with other medications and shouldn't be used long-term.
downsides: Nuvigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Reduces the effectiveness of birth control pills. You need to use an additional contraceptive method while taking Nuvigil.
Nuvigil is processed in the liver so it's not a good choice if you have liver, or even kidney, problems.

downsides_processed.orig: Nuvigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Reduces the effectiveness of birth control pills. You need to use an additional contraceptive method while taking Nuvigil.
Nuvigil is processed in the liver so it's not a good choice if you have liver, or even kidney, problems.

upsides: Effective in treating excess sleepiness in shift work sleep disorder (SWSD).
It's a non-amphetamine medication that helps improve alertness.

upsides_processed.orig: Effective in treating excess sleepiness in shift work sleep disorder (SWSD).
It's a non-amphetamine medication that helps improve alertness.

drugs.name: Nuvigil

carousel_items_processed.orig: If using for shift work sleep disorder (SWSD), take Nuvigil about an hour before the start of your shift.
Taking caffeine with Nuvigil can make you feel nervous, shaky, and will raise your heartbeat.
If you've been taking Nuvigil for a while and decide to stop it, you'll experience withdrawal symptoms if you stop it too fast.
Tell your doctor right away if you break out in a rash.
Don't drink alcohol with Nuvigil.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful and avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful and avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Nuvigil can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Nuvigil can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Severe and possibly fatal reactions (e.g. Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis) can happen anytime and as early as the first day while taking Nuvigil. Tell your doctor or get medical help right away if you notice sores or fluid-filled blisters on your skin, lips, or inside your mouth or peeling skin that's painful.

description_processed.orig: Severe and possibly fatal reactions (e.g. Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis) can happen anytime and as early as the first day while taking Nuvigil. Tell your doctor or get medical help right away if you notice sores or fluid-filled blisters on your skin, lips, or inside your mouth or peeling skin that's painful.

risks_warnings.title: Increased side effects
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need a different dose, or other medication, to prevent increased risk of side effects.

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need a different dose, or other medication, to prevent increased risk of side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil is not recommended in people with a history of heart problems. If you have a history of cardiovascular disease, talk to your doctor before use.

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil is not recommended in people with a history of heart problems. If you have a history of cardiovascular disease, talk to your doctor before use.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior | Mania
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil can increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil can increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

carousel_items: Take Provigil about an hour before you need to be fully alert.
Taking caffeine with Provigil can cause you to feel nervous, shaky, and have a faster heartbeat. Try limiting your caffeine intake.
Until you know how Provigil makes you feel, don't drive or perform any tasks that need you to be alert.
You can experience withdrawal symptoms if you suddenly stop taking Provigil. Talk to your doctor before making any changes.
Tell your doctor right away if you break out in a rash.
Don't drink alcohol with Provigil.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Provigil is a stimulant that helps you feel awake. Researchers don't know exactly how Provigil works, but it probably affects chemicals (neurotransmitters) in the brain.
basics.bottom_line: Provigil is effective in improving alertness, but it can interact with other medicines and shouldn't be used long-term.
downsides: Provigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Taking Provigil will make hormonal birth control less effective. You should definitely use additional forms of non-hormonal contraception.
Not a good choice if you have liver or kidney problems.

downsides_processed.orig: Provigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Taking Provigil will make hormonal birth control less effective. You should definitely use additional forms of non-hormonal contraception.
Not a good choice if you have liver or kidney problems.

upsides: It's a non-amphetamine medicine that helps improve alertness.
Effective in reducing excessive sleepiness in Shift-work Sleep Disorder.

upsides_processed.orig: It's a non-amphetamine medicine that helps improve alertness.
Effective in reducing excessive sleepiness in Shift-work Sleep Disorder.

userStories.tip:
Hospice is wanting me to change Provigil. To ritalin.  
I was put on this medicine for narcolepsy.  They are saying that ritalin is or will be safer concerning my heart disease.
It's controlled so dont forget your id.

I got a little irritable.

userStories.identifier: Parent, fun time employee, MS 25+ years
userStories.tip: Never go off of this all of a sudden.  Works well in combo with Ampyra.
start with small doses (80-100mg) you really don't need much to achieve a noticeable benefit
Stepping down the dose paradoxically made it work better after your body gets used to the regular dose. Very very effective drug for staying awake with few side effects. Truly remarkable.

Needs to be taken daily to maintain a stable amount in your system. I get headaches the first day or two, but none after then. (Also, I'm a bit jittery the first day on too) You won't notice its impact until you have to go a day without it!
Provigil is simply the most effective focus drug in existence.

userStories.indication: Excessive daytime sleepiness associate with sleep apnea
userStories.tip: Take as needed. Tend to develop dry mouth. Effect good for ~6hrs

carousel_items: Take 30 to 45 minutes before bedtime.
Only take it if you have time to sleep for at least 7 hours.
Very addictive. Meant for short-term treatment. Dependence can form after daily use for 2 weeks.
Can cause headache, drowsiness, and dizziness.
Can cause sleep-walking, sleep-driving, and sleep-eating.
Works best if taken without food.
Avoid alcohol and drugs.
Withdrawal symptoms usually resolve in 1 to 2 nights.
Report any confusion or changes in thoughts or behavior.

clock.tip: Works faster if not taken with food, or immediately after a meal.

basics.benefits_moa: Lunesta is in a class of drugs called sedative-hypnotics. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it interacts with your brain to make you relaxed and sleepy.
basics.bottom_line: Lunesta is good for falling asleep and staying asleep. Not as habit-forming as some sleep medicines, but more likely to cause withdrawal symptoms if you stop suddenly.
downsides: More likely to cause withdrawal symptoms if you stop taking it suddenly.
Might not be safe if you have a history of drug or alcohol abuse, depression, lung disease, or a condition that affects metabolism.
It's easy to become reliant on sleep medicines. In the long run, it's better to learn good sleeping habits and behavior so that you can sleep better naturally.

downsides_processed.orig: More likely to cause withdrawal symptoms if you stop taking it suddenly.
Might not be safe if you have a history of drug or alcohol abuse, depression, lung disease, or a condition that affects metabolism.
It's easy to become reliant on sleep medicines. In the long run, it's better to learn good sleeping habits and behavior so that you can sleep better naturally.

upsides: Effective at helping people fall asleep faster and sleep longer.
Not as habit-forming, so you can use it for longer than most other sleep medicines.

upsides_processed.orig: Effective at helping people fall asleep faster and sleep longer.
Not as habit-forming, so you can use it for longer than most other sleep medicines.

userStories.tip: make sure to have water at the ready.  You'll want to avoid the aftertaste

userStories.identifier: had insomnia for 40 years before Luniest
userStories.tip: This is a monster breakthrough for insomniacs. Based on an earlier European drug, it is one of the very few, perhaps the only, good drugs for insomnia. The difference between no sleep and moderate sleep is a vast life improvement to me.
leaves horrible taste in your mouth in the morning
Works well particularly when I am adjusting to a new time zone or readjusting to home zone.  Makes it so much easier to get and stay asleep.   Taste not an issue if I take with water!
Leaves a DISGUSTING taste in your mouth that I couldn't ever seem to avoid.

Lunesta works best for light sleepers and is ideal for shift workers. It doesn't knock you out so much as it puts you in a deep sleep for about six hours. What I like best about it is I don't feel groggy when I wake up.
userStories.identifier: Journalist working all hours of the day

userStories.tip: If you don't go to bed, you can miss your 'sleep window' and then you wasted a pill. Also, I realized that the sleep quality is slightly less good than natural sleep
Really works for the tough nights.  When I take a Lunesta, I sleep more soundly and don't wake up as many times a night.  Pricey though....

drugs.name: Lunesta

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take 30 to 45 minutes before bedtime.
Only take it if you have time to sleep for at least 7 hours.
Very addictive. Meant for short-term treatment. Dependence can form after daily use for 2 weeks.
Can cause headache, drowsiness, and dizziness.
Can cause sleep-walking, sleep-driving, and sleep-eating.
Works best if taken without food.
Avoid alcohol and drugs.
Withdrawal symptoms usually resolve in 1 to 2 nights.
Report any confusion or changes in thoughts or behavior.

risks_warnings.title: Dependence and withdrawal
risks_warnings.description: All prescription sleep-aid medicines like Lunesta have a risk of physical dependence. Dependence means that you'll feel withdrawal symptoms if you stop taking the medication all at once. Talk to your doctor about natural ways to improve sleep or treat underlying conditions that prevent sleep.
risk_factors: Continuous use for 2 weeks or more

description_processed.orig: All prescription sleep-aid medicines like Lunesta have a risk of physical dependence. Dependence means that you'll feel withdrawal symptoms if you stop taking the medication all at once. Talk to your doctor about natural ways to improve sleep or treat underlying conditions that prevent sleep.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Lunesta can reduces your ability to focus, think, and react. These effects can extend to the morning after taking Lunesta. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how the medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Lunesta can reduces your ability to focus, think, and react. These effects can extend to the morning after taking Lunesta. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how the medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Abnormal thoughts
risks_warnings.description: Lunesta can be disinhibiting (like alcohol) or cause hallucinations. Tell your doctor if you notice any unusual changes in behavior.

description_processed.orig: Lunesta can be disinhibiting (like alcohol) or cause hallucinations. Tell your doctor if you notice any unusual changes in behavior.

risks_warnings.title: Sleep driving
risks_warnings.description: Lunesta increases your risk of performing potentially dangerous activities while asleep, such as sleep-walking, sleep-driving, and sleep-eating. Talk to your doctor immediately about stopping Lunesta if any sleep-related activities occur.
risk_factors: Taking with alcohol or drugs that acts in the brain

description_processed.orig: Lunesta increases your risk of performing potentially dangerous activities while asleep, such as sleep-walking, sleep-driving, and sleep-eating. Talk to your doctor immediately about stopping Lunesta if any sleep-related activities occur.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Lunesta can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Lunesta can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Risk of falls and injury
risks_warnings.description: Lunesta make you feel drowsy and sleepy, leading to falls and severe injuries. This is especially a risk if your older. Falls from sleep medicines like Lunesta have caused severe injuries such as hip fractures and head injury. You may need a lower dose if you're taking other medicine that affects your nervous system or have issues with falls in the past. Check with your doctor first.
risk_factors: Taking Lunesta with other nervous system depressants

description_processed.orig: Lunesta make you feel drowsy and sleepy, leading to falls and severe injuries. This is especially a risk if your older. Falls from sleep medicines like Lunesta have caused severe injuries such as hip fractures and head injury. You may need a lower dose if you're taking other medicine that affects your nervous system or have issues with falls in the past. Check with your doctor first.

risks_warnings.title: Risk to fetus
risks_warnings.description: It’s not clear if Lunesta can harm your unborn baby. Studies in animals showed risk. It’s also not known if Lunesta passes into breast-milk. Use only during pregnancy if benefits outweigh risks.

description_processed.orig: It’s not clear if Lunesta can harm your unborn baby. Studies in animals showed risk. It’s also not known if Lunesta passes into breast-milk. Use only during pregnancy if benefits outweigh risks.

carousel_items: Take it once a day to control asthma and allergy symptoms.
If you're using it for asthma or allergies, take it in the evening.
Use it 2 hours before exercising.
Granules can be taken by mouth or dissolved in liquid or soft food.
Doesn't treat sudden wheezing or asthma attacks once they start. Keep a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you.
The chewable tablets contain aspartame, so don't use them if you have a sensitivity to phenylalanine or phenylketones.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.
Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Montelukast is a leukotriene inhibitor. It lowers inflammation in your lungs and nasal passages to prevent asthma and relieve allergies.
basics.bottom_line: Montelukast has fewer side effects but doesn't work as well as steroid inhalers for asthma. It also helps with allergies.
downsides: You have to use Montelukast every day to control your symptoms.
Somewhat less effective than corticosteroid inhalers for asthma.
There's no generic available, so it can be expensive.
Can cause behavior changes, agitation, aggression, and difficulty sleeping for some people.

downsides_processed.orig: You have to use Montelukast every day to control your symptoms.
Somewhat less effective than corticosteroid inhalers for asthma.
There's no generic available, so it can be expensive.
Can cause behavior changes, agitation, aggression, and difficulty sleeping for some people.

upsides: Prevents symptoms and improves lung function in children and adults with chronic asthma.
A single 10 mg dose improves exercise-induced asthma symptoms for up to 24 hours.
Fewer side effects compared to other asthma treatments.
Effective pill alternative to corticosteroid inhalers.

upsides_processed.orig: Prevents symptoms and improves lung function in children and adults with chronic asthma.
A single 10 mg dose improves exercise-induced asthma symptoms for up to 24 hours.
Fewer side effects compared to other asthma treatments.
Effective pill alternative to corticosteroid inhalers.

userStories.tip: I was using many years. In 2005 I had a bleeding episode that could have been a side effect. in 2012 I had my first seizure and decided to read all my med labels. I quit Singular that day.

My daughter was prescribed Singulair when she was six. Horrible side effects to mental and cognitive functioning. Learned after the fact some singular has similar effects on other kids. Parents beware.
I can't take inhaled corticosteroids to control my asthma. This has worked quite well meanwhile..

I wish I hadn't let the fear of the depression side effect prevent me from taking singular for so long,  it works where inhalers do not work for me, and it controls my asthma well in generic montelukast form or Singulair form.
Don't skip a day because it isn't fast acting.  My cat allergies act up for days after being near a cat.

My insurance refuses to cover Singulair, but the generic form doesn't seem to control my asthma as well. One of my pharmacists told me this was the case for himself as well, and that generic was better just for allergies. Singulair is $$$
Caused major depression and angry outbursts which is very unusual for me. I ended up taking half dosage along with St Johns Wort to balance.

For the first several months I did not follow the instructions and took it in the morning (alongside Allegra, Zyrtec, whatever I was using at the time). Now I take it at night and it's far more effective for managing asthma symptoms.
Works perfectly without any side effect, just one pill before going to bed.
I take it at night, along with 2 puffs of Symbicort 80/4.5mcg

drugs.name: Singulair

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take it once a day to control asthma and allergy symptoms.
If you're using it for asthma or allergies, take it in the evening.
Use it 2 hours before exercising.
Granules can be taken by mouth or dissolved in liquid or soft food.
Doesn't treat sudden wheezing or asthma attacks once they start. Keep a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you.
The chewable tablets contain aspartame, so don't use them if you have a sensitivity to phenylalanine or phenylketones.

risks_warnings.title: Sudden onset of asthma
risks_warnings.description: Montelukast is not used to treat sudden wheezing or asthma attack. You should have a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you all the time especially if you are prone to asthma during exercise. Talk to you doctor if your symptoms do not improve or seem to worsen while taking Montelukast.

description_processed.orig: Montelukast is not used to treat sudden wheezing or asthma attack. You should have a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you all the time especially if you are prone to asthma during exercise. Talk to you doctor if your symptoms do not improve or seem to worsen while taking Montelukast.

risks_warnings.title: Aggression and agitation
risks_warnings.description: Rare cases of behavior changes occur in adults and children taking Montelukast. Symptoms range from irritability and memory problems to hallucinations and suicidal thinking. It is not clear if this is linked to history of these conditions. Get medical help immediately if you notice symptoms of agitation, aggression, sleep disturbance, or suicidal thoughts while taking Montelukast.

description_processed.orig: Rare cases of behavior changes occur in adults and children taking Montelukast. Symptoms range from irritability and memory problems to hallucinations and suicidal thinking. It is not clear if this is linked to history of these conditions. Get medical help immediately if you notice symptoms of agitation, aggression, sleep disturbance, or suicidal thoughts while taking Montelukast.

risks_warnings.title: Blood disorder (eosinophilia)
risks_warnings.description: There are reports of a blood disorder in people taking Montelukast. It's not clear what the link is between this blood vessel condition and Montelukast. Talk to your doctor if you notice red patches/rash or skin color changes on lower legs, numbness/tingling, or worsening of your asthma symptoms. You may need to stop taking Montelukast.

description_processed.orig: There are reports of a blood disorder in people taking Montelukast. It's not clear what the link is between this blood vessel condition and Montelukast. Talk to your doctor if you notice red patches/rash or skin color changes on lower legs, numbness/tingling, or worsening of your asthma symptoms. You may need to stop taking Montelukast.

risks_warnings.title: Brain damage from too much phenylalanine
risks_warnings.description: Montelukast contains aspartame (phenylalanine). People who have phenylketonuria (PKU) can't break down the amino acid phenylalanine. It builds up and causes serious medical problems. If you have PKU, don't use this product.

description_processed.orig: Montelukast contains aspartame (phenylalanine). People who have phenylketonuria (PKU) can't break down the amino acid phenylalanine. It builds up and causes serious medical problems. If you have PKU, don't use this product.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: There are reports of liver injury in people taking Montelukast mostly in combination with other factors such as drugs, alcohol, and liver disease. If you have any of these risk factors, your doctor will need to check your liver function periodically.
risk_factors: History of liver disease including hepatitis
Other medications that cause liver injury
